verses.verse: Then SHlomo <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> <WH8686> the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and all the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294>, the chief <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, unto king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, that they might bring up <WH5927> <WH8687> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> out of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, which is TZiyon <WH6726>.

And all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> assembled <WH6950> <WH8735> themselves unto king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010> at the feast <WH2282> in the month <WH3391> Ethanim <WH388>, which is the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>.
And all the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8799>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> took up <WH5375> <WH8799> the ark <WH727>.

And they brought up <WH5927> <WH8686> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, and all the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that were in the tabernacle <WH168>, even those did the Kohanim <WH3548> and the L'vi'im <WH3881> bring up <WH5927> <WH8686>.

And king <WH4428> SHlomo <WH8010>, and all the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that were assembled <WH3259> <WH8737> unto him, were with him before <WH6440> the ark <WH727>, sacrificing <WH2076> <WH8764> sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241>, that could not be told <WH5608> <WH8735> nor numbered <WH4487> <WH8735> for multitude <WH7230>.

And the Kohanim <WH3548> brought in <WH935> <WH8686> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> unto his place <WH4725>, into the oracle <WH1687> of the house <WH1004>, to the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place, even under the wings <WH3671> of the cherubims <WH3742>.

For the cherubims <WH3742> spread forth <WH6566> <WH8802> their two wings <WH3671> over the place <WH4725> of the ark <WH727>, and the cherubims <WH3742> covered <WH5526> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> and the staves <WH905> thereof above <WH4605>.

And they drew out <WH748> <WH8686> the staves <WH905>, that the ends <WH7218> of the staves <WH905> were seen out <WH7200> <WH8735> in the holy <WH6944> place before <WH6440> the oracle <WH1687>, and they were not seen <WH7200> <WH8735> without <WH2351>: and there they are unto this day <WH3117>.

There was nothing in the ark <WH727> save <WH7535> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, which Mosheh <WH4872> put <WH3240> <WH8689> there at Horev <WH2722>, when the YY <WH3068> made <WH3772> <WH8804> a covenant with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when they came out <WH3318> <WH8800> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And it came to pass, when the Kohanim <WH3548> were come out <WH3318> <WH8800> of the holy <WH6944> place, that the cloud <WH6051> filled <WH4390> <WH8804> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>,

So that the Kohanim <WH3548> could <WH3201> <WH8804> not stand <WH5975> <WH8800> to minister <WH8334> <WH8763> because <WH6440> of the cloud <WH6051>: for the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> had filled <WH4390> <WH8804> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.
Then spake <WH559> <WH8804> SHlomo <WH8010>, The YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8804> that he would dwell <WH7931> <WH8800> in the thick darkness <WH6205>.
I have surely <WH1129> <WH8800> built <WH1129> <WH8804> thee an house <WH1004> to dwell in <WH2073>, a settled place <WH4349> for thee to abide in <WH3427> <WH8800> for ever <WH5769>.

And the king <WH4428> turned <WH5437> his face <WH6440> about <WH5437> <WH8686>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> all the congregation <WH6951> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: (and all the congregation <WH6951> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> stood <WH5975> <WH8802>;)

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which spake <WH1696> <WH8765> with his mouth <WH6310> unto David <WH1732> my father <WH1>, and hath with his hand <WH3027> fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8765> it, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Since the day <WH3117> that I brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of Egypt <WH4714>, I chose <WH977> <WH8804> no city <WH5892> out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to build <WH1129> <WH8800> an house <WH1004>, that my name <WH8034> might be therein; but I chose <WH977> <WH8799> David <WH1732> to be over my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And it was in the heart <WH3824> of David <WH1732> my father <WH1> to build <WH1129> <WH8800> an house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto David <WH1732> my father <WH1>, Whereas <WH3282> <WH834> it was in thine heart <WH3824> to build <WH1129> <WH8800> an house <WH1004> unto my name <WH8034>, thou didst well <WH2895> <WH8689> that it was in thine heart <WH3824>.

Nevertheless <WH7535> thou shalt not build <WH1129> <WH8799> the house <WH1004>; but thy son <WH1121> that shall come forth out <WH3318> <WH8802> of thy loins <WH2504>, he shall build <WH1129> <WH8799> the house <WH1004> unto my name <WH8034>.

And the YY <WH3068> hath performed <WH6965> <WH8686> his word <WH1697> that he spake <WH1696> <WH8765>, and I am risen up <WH6965> <WH8799> in the room of David <WH1732> my father <WH1>, and sit <WH3427> <WH8799> on the throne <WH3678> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, as the YY <WH3068> promised <WH1696> <WH8765>, and have built <WH1129> <WH8799> an house <WH1004> for the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And I have set <WH7760> <WH8799> there a place <WH4725> for the ark <WH727>, wherein is the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068>, which he made <WH3772> <WH8804> with our fathers <WH1>, when he brought them out <WH3318> <WH8687> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And SHlomo <WH8010> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068> in the presence of <WH5048> all the congregation <WH6951> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and spread forth <WH6566> <WH8799> his hands <WH3709> toward heaven <WH8064>:

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, there is no 'Elohim <WH430> like thee, in heaven <WH8064> above <WH4605>, or on earth <WH776> beneath, who keepest <WH8104> <WH8802> covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> with thy servants <WH5650> that walk <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee with all their heart <WH3820>:

Who hast kept <WH8104> <WH8804> with thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father <WH1> that thou promisedst <WH1696> <WH8765> him: thou spakest <WH1696> <WH8762> also with thy mouth <WH6310>, and hast fulfilled <WH4390> <WH8765> it with thine hand <WH3027>, as it is this day <WH3117>.

Therefore now, YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, keep <WH8104> <WH8798> with thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father <WH1> that thou promisedst <WH1696> <WH8765> him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, There shall not fail <WH3772> <WH8735> thee a man <WH376> in my sight <WH6440> to sit <WH3427> <WH8802> on the throne <WH3678> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; so <WH7535> that thy children <WH1121> take heed <WH8104> <WH8799> to their way <WH1870>, that they walk <WH3212> <WH8800> before <WH6440> me as thou hast walked <WH1980> <WH8804> before <WH6440> me.

And now, O 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, let thy word <WH1697>, I pray thee, be verified <WH539> <WH8735>, which thou spakest <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> my father <WH1>.

But will 'Elohim <WH430> indeed <WH552> dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> on the earth <WH776>? behold, the heaven <WH8064> and heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064> cannot contain <WH3557> <WH8770> thee; how much less <WH637> this house <WH1004> that I have builded <WH1129> <WH8804> ?

Yet have thou respect <WH6437> <WH8804> unto the prayer <WH8605> of thy servant <WH5650>, and to his supplication <WH8467>, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, to hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto the cry <WH7440> and to the prayer <WH8605>, which thy servant <WH5650> prayeth <WH6419> <WH8693> before <WH6440> thee to day <WH3117>:

That thine eyes <WH5869> may be open <WH6605> <WH8803> toward this house <WH1004> night <WH3915> and day <WH3117>, even toward the place <WH4725> of which thou hast said <WH559> <WH8804>, My name <WH8034> shall be there: that thou mayest hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto the prayer <WH8605> which thy servant <WH5650> shall make <WH6419> <WH8691> toward this place <WH4725>.

And hearken <WH8085> <WH8804> thou to the supplication <WH8467> of thy servant <WH5650>, and of thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when they shall pray <WH6419> <WH8691> toward this place <WH4725>: and hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> <WH8800> place <WH4725>: and when thou hearest <WH8085> <WH8804>, forgive <WH5545> <WH8804>.

If any man <WH376> trespass <WH2398> <WH8799> against his neighbour <WH7453>, and an oath <WH423> be laid <WH5375> <WH8804> upon him to cause him to swear <WH422> <WH8687>, and the oath <WH423> come <WH935> <WH8804> before <WH6440> thine altar <WH4196> in this house <WH1004>:

Then hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804>, and judge <WH8199> <WH8804> thy servants <WH5650>, condemning <WH7561> <WH8687> the wicked <WH7563>, to bring <WH5414> <WH8800> his way <WH1870> upon his head <WH7218>; and justifying <WH6663> <WH8687> the righteous <WH6662>, to give <WH5414> <WH8800> him according to his righteousness <WH6666>.

When thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478> be smitten down <WH5062> <WH8736> before <WH6440> the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, because they have sinned <WH2398> <WH8799> against thee, and shall turn again <WH7725> <WH8804> to thee, and confess <WH3034> <WH8689> thy name <WH8034>, and pray <WH6419> <WH8694>, and make supplication <WH2603> <WH8694> unto thee in this house <WH1004>:

Then hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064>, and forgive <WH5545> <WH8804> the sin <WH2403> of thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and bring them again <WH7725> <WH8689> unto the land <WH127> which thou gavest <WH5414> <WH8804> unto their fathers <WH1>.

When heaven <WH8064> is shut up <WH6113> <WH8736>, and there is no rain <WH4306>, because they have sinned <WH2398> <WH8799> against thee; if they pray <WH6419> <WH8694> toward this place <WH4725>, and confess <WH3034> <WH8689> thy name <WH8034>, and turn <WH7725> <WH8799> from their sin <WH2403>, when thou afflictest <WH6031> <WH8686> them:

Then hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064>, and forgive <WH5545> <WH8804> the sin <WH2403> of thy servants <WH5650>, and of thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that thou teach <WH3384> <WH8686> them the good <WH2896> way <WH1870> wherein they should walk <WH3212> <WH8799>, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> rain <WH4306> upon thy land <WH776>, which thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> to thy people <WH5971> for an inheritance <WH5159>.

If there be in the land <WH776> famine <WH7458>, if there be pestilence <WH1698>, blasting <WH7711>, mildew <WH3420>, locust <WH697>, or if there be caterpiller <WH2625>; if their enemy <WH341> <WH8802> besiege <WH6887> <WH8686> them in the land <WH776> of their cities <WH8179>; whatsoever plague <WH5061>, whatsoever sickness <WH4245> there be;

What prayer <WH8605> and supplication <WH8467> soever be made by any man <WH120>, or by all thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which shall know <WH3045> <WH8799> every man <WH376> the plague <WH5061> of his own heart <WH3824>, and spread forth <WH6566> <WH8804> his hands <WH3709> toward this house <WH1004>:

Then hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> <WH8800> place <WH4349>, and forgive <WH5545> <WH8804>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804>, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> to every man <WH376> according to his ways <WH1870>, whose heart <WH3824> thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8799>; (for thou, even thou only, knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> the hearts <WH3824> of all the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>;)
That they may fear <WH3372> <WH8799> thee all the days <WH3117> that they live <WH2416> in <WH6440> the land <WH127> which thou gavest <WH5414> <WH8804> unto our fathers <WH1>.
Moreover concerning a stranger <WH5237>, that is not of thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, but cometh out <WH935> <WH8804> of a far <WH7350> country <WH776> for <WH4616> thy name's <WH8034> sake;

(For they shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> of thy great <WH1419> name <WH8034>, and of thy strong <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and of thy stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>;) when he shall come <WH935> <WH8804> and pray <WH6419> <WH8694> toward this house <WH1004>;

Hear <WH8085> <WH8799> thou in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> <WH8800> place <WH4349>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> according to all that the stranger <WH5237> calleth <WH7121> <WH8799> to thee for: that all people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> may know <WH3045> <WH8799> thy name <WH8034>, to fear <WH3372> <WH8800> thee, as do thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and that they may know <WH3045> <WH8800> that this house <WH1004>, which I have builded <WH1129> <WH8804>, is called <WH7121> <WH8738> by thy name <WH8034>.

If thy people <WH5971> go out <WH3318> <WH8799> to battle <WH4421> against their enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, whithersoever <WH1870> thou shalt send <WH7971> <WH8799> them, and shall pray <WH6419> <WH8694> unto the YY <WH3068> toward <WH1870> the city <WH5892> which thou hast chosen <WH977> <WH8804>, and toward the house <WH1004> that I have built <WH1129> <WH8804> for thy name <WH8034>:
Then hear <WH8085> <WH8804> thou in heaven <WH8064> their prayer <WH8605> and their supplication <WH8467>, and maintain <WH6213> <WH8804> their cause <WH4941>.

If they sin <WH2398> <WH8799> against thee, (for there is no man <WH120> that sinneth <WH2398> <WH8799> not,) and thou be angry <WH599> <WH8804> with them, and deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> them to the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, so that they carry them away <WH7617> <WH8804> captives <WH7617> <WH8802> unto <WH6440> the land <WH776> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, far <WH7350> or near <WH7138>;

Yet if they shall bethink <WH7725> <WH8689> themselves in the land <WH776> whither they were carried captives <WH7617> <WH8738>, and repent <WH7725> <WH8804> <WH3820>, and make supplication <WH2603> <WH8694> unto thee in the land <WH776> of them that carried them captives <WH7617> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and have done perversely <WH5753> <WH8689>, we have committed wickedness <WH7561> <WH8804>;

And so return <WH7725> <WH8804> unto thee with all their heart <WH3824>, and with all their soul <WH5315>, in the land <WH776> of their enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, which led them away captive <WH7617> <WH8804>, and pray <WH6419> <WH8694> unto thee toward <WH1870> their land <WH776>, which thou gavest <WH5414> <WH8804> unto their fathers <WH1>, the city <WH5892> which thou hast chosen <WH977> <WH8804>, and the house <WH1004> which I have built <WH1129> <WH8804> for thy name <WH8034>:

Then hear <WH8085> <WH8804> thou their prayer <WH8605> and their supplication <WH8467> in heaven <WH8064> thy dwelling <WH3427> <WH8800> place <WH4349>, and maintain <WH6213> <WH8804> their cause <WH4941>,

And forgive <WH5545> <WH8804> thy people <WH5971> that have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against thee, and all their transgressions <WH6588> wherein they have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against thee, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> them compassion <WH7356> before <WH6440> them who carried them captive <WH7617> <WH8802>, that they may have compassion <WH7355> <WH8765> on them:
For they be thy people <WH5971>, and thine inheritance <WH5159>, which thou broughtest forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714>, from the midst <WH8432> of the furnace <WH3564> of iron <WH1270>:

That thine eyes <WH5869> may be open <WH6605> <WH8803> unto the supplication <WH8467> of thy servant <WH5650>, and unto the supplication <WH8467> of thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto them in all that they call <WH7121> <WH8800> for unto thee.

For thou didst separate <WH914> <WH8689> them from among all the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776>, to be thine inheritance <WH5159>, as thou spakest <WH1696> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872> thy servant <WH5650>, when thou broughtest <WH3318> <WH8687> our fathers <WH1> out of Egypt <WH4714>, O YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And it was so, that when SHlomo <WH8010> had made an end <WH3615> <WH8763> of davvening <WH6419> <WH8692> all this prayer <WH8605> and supplication <WH8467> unto the YY <WH3068>, he arose <WH6965> <WH8804> from before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068>, from kneeling <WH3766> <WH8800> on his knees <WH1290> with his hands <WH3709> spread up <WH6566> <WH8803> to heaven <WH8064>.
And he stood <WH5975> <WH8799>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> all the congregation <WH6951> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068>, that hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> rest <WH4496> unto his people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, according to all that he promised <WH1696> <WH8765>: there hath not failed <WH5307> <WH8804> one <WH259> word <WH1697> of all his good <WH2896> promise <WH1697>, which he promised <WH1696> <WH8765> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872> his servant <WH5650>.
The YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> be with us, as he was with our fathers <WH1>: let him not leave <WH5800> <WH8799> us, nor forsake <WH5203> <WH8799> us:

That he may incline <WH5186> <WH8687> our hearts <WH3824> unto him, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in all his ways <WH1870>, and to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687>, and his statutes <WH2706>, and his judgments <WH4941>, which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> our fathers <WH1>.

And let these my words <WH1697>, wherewith I have made supplication <WH2603> <WH8694> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, be nigh <WH7138> unto the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, that he maintain <WH6213> <WH8800> the cause <WH4941> of his servant <WH5650>, and the cause <WH4941> of his people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478> at all times <WH3117> <WH3117>, as the matter <WH1697> shall require:
That all the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> may know <WH3045> <WH8800> that the YY <WH3068> is 'Elohim <WH430>, and that there is none else.

Let your heart <WH3824> therefore be perfect <WH8003> with the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in his statutes <WH2706>, and to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his Mitzvot <WH4687>, as at this day <WH3117>.
And the king <WH4428>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, offered <WH2076> <WH8802> sacrifice <WH2077> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

And SHlomo <WH8010> offered <WH2076> <WH8799> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002>, which he offered <WH2076> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068>, two <WH8147> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> oxen <WH1241>, and an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> sheep <WH6629>. So the king <WH4428> and all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> dedicated <WH2596> <WH8799> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

The same day <WH3117> did the king <WH4428> hallow <WH6942> <WH8765> the middle <WH8432> of the court <WH2691> that was before <WH6440> the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>: for there he offered <WH6213> <WH8804> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and meat offerings <WH4503>, and the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings <WH8002>: because the brasen <WH5178> altar <WH4196> that was before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> was too little <WH6996> to receive <WH3557> <WH8687> the burnt offerings <WH5930>, and meat offerings <WH4503>, and the fat <WH2459> of the peace offerings <WH8002>.

And at that time <WH6256> SHlomo <WH8010> held <WH6213> <WH8799> a feast <WH2282>, and all Yisra'EL <WH3478> with him, a great <WH1419> congregation <WH6951>, from the entering <WH935> <WH8800> in of Hamath <WH2574> unto the river <WH5158> of Egypt <WH4714>, before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> and seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, even fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> days <WH3117>.

On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> he sent <WH7971> the people <WH5971> away <WH7971> <WH8765>: and they blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> the king <WH4428>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> unto their tents <WH168> joyful <WH8056> and glad <WH2896> of heart <WH3820> for all the goodness <WH2896> that the YY <WH3068> had done <WH6213> <WH8804> for David <WH1732> his servant <WH5650>, and for Yisra'EL <WH3478> his people <WH5971>.
